title: Meta Will Freeze Most Hiring, Zuckerberg Tells Employees
description: The company’s chief executive had signaled for several months that he wanted to rein in costs as he shifts attention toward the metaverse.

title: Google to Shut Down Stadia Video Game Streaming Service
description: After nearly three years, Google has decided to winnow its video game ambitions because Stadia was less popular than it had anticipated.
